Redondo_Beach.Redondo Beach Public Library: The Redondo Beach Public Library is a small Spanish mission-style public works building located in Redondo Beach, California. Originally built to house the city's library, today it is used mainly for renting space for special events. It was built in the 1930s by Lovell Bearse Pemberton and is located adjacent to the Redondo Beach Pier, a popular tourist attraction in the Los Angeles Metropolitan Area.
